inclusion.criterion: Adult males and non-pregnant females (more than 18 and less than equal to 50 years of age).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serological evidence of hepatitis C infection by an anti-HCV antibody test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of cirrhosis on liver biopsy.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of alcohol or drug abuse.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who do not consent to be included in the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of cirrhosis on liver biopsy.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of HCV Cirrhosis and recent admission for UGIB, which may indicate decompensated liver disease.
